dataset.title: Oomycetes Internal Transcribed Spacer RNA (ITS) RefSeq Targeted Loci Project

abstract.para: Similar to the Fungi ITS RefSeq Targeted Loci project (PRJNA177353) we aim to provide a curated set of complete and near full length sequences with specimen data and correct taxonomic names with the help from experts in the Ooomycetes research community. Database URL: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA362621.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.
